generatedSources.name: #utility.yul

deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

documentation.text: Public task count variable that holds the total number of tasks on the Blockchain.

Like a Map type Variable in [Dart], or a dictionary type variable in [Swift]
 or a json type variable in [JavaScript]
the key is a uint256, and the Value is a Task Object.
Values of a mapping data type are accessed like: `todos[key]`
TaskCreated Event will be emitted when a new task is created.

TaskToggled even will be emitted when a request for a task to be emitted is sent from the client side.
 it takes in the index[key] and  isCompleted[boolean value]

statements.documentation: Task Count is being increased, because it holds the total lenght of tasks on the blockchain.

TaskCreated(string,uint256).notice: TaskCreated Event will be emitted when a new task is created.

TaskToggled(uint256,bool).notice: TaskToggled even will be emitted when a request for a task to be emitted is sent from the client side. it takes in the index[key] and  isCompleted[boolean value]

taskCount().notice: Public task count variable that holds the total number of tasks on the Blockchain.

todos(uint256).notice: Like a Map type Variable in [Dart], or a dictionary type variable in [Swift] or a json type variable in [JavaScript] the key is a uint256, and the Value is a Task Object. Values of a mapping data type are accessed like: `todos[key]`
